question:
Write a letter to your friend who has asked you about a short course, which you have done.
Write about the content of the course. 
The future benefit of the course.
text: I hope you're doing well.I received your letter  in which you've asked about the course that I finished last month.I'm writing to let you know about the details.

Well, I joined  the Australian academy in the vicinity of my area.It offers English speaking course that includes the enhancement of listening, speaking, reading and writing skills.I find it quite interesting and motivating as well.Furthermore, they offer a class size of six to seven students so that teachers can track the progress of the students in an effective manner.

Moreover, this is quite beneficial from a future point of view. I know you are planning to move abroad to build your career there and English is one of the  most widely spoken languages in the foreign countries that's why I think you should join this course as it will help you in clearing IELTS at the earliest.
Hope you are satisfied with the information.If you've any query please feel free to call me anytime.
